quest.Name: Save Who You Can Save
quest.Accomplishment: You found out about the fate of the missing Barathrumite expedition.
quest.Hagiograph: In the month of =month= of =year=, impervious =name= repelled creeping fungi from jungle villages.
quest.Gospel: Leading a clan of urshiib, =name= held a seance, warding off spirits that had taken over the dreams of peaceful beings and liberating the people of Nodd.

step.Name: Talk to Hortensa
step.text: Hortensa is looking for help with a missing Barathrumite expedition.

step.Name: Travel to Nodd
step.text: Make your way across the jungle to the village of Nodd, two parasangs west of the Rainbow Wood.

step.Name: Retrieve the Barathrumite Expedition Logs
step.text: Discover the fate of the Barathrumite expedition and retrieve its detailed expedition logs.

step.Name: Report Back to Hortensa
step.text: Bring the expedition logs back to Hortensa.
